column1:
In  the  next  case  Magistrate  Court  of Kesbewa  in  Case  No:  73220  and 
in  the

Magistrate  Court  Kesbewa  73226 
learned  Magistrate  has  imposed  one  year

each  for  theft  and 
retention  of stolen  property. 
Since  the  retention  of stolen

property 
is  alternate  count 
this  court 
revise 
the  order  and 
removes 
the

conviction  and  sentence 
under  section  396.  Accordingly  the  convict  serves

only  one  year  in  case  No:  73226. 
Magistrate  Court  of  Kesbewa  in  Case
